snippet.title: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2 - Gameplay Presentation
snippet.description:
Steam Early Access: http://store.steampowered.com/app/279940/

The Book of Unwritten Tales 2 is a classic point-and-click adventure like Monkey Island, Discworld or Simon the Sorcerer, set in a typical RPG fantasy world. In this trailer, we show you gameplay and introduce a couple of characters from the first two chapters of the game. The game is available at Steam Early Access: http://store.steampowered.com/app/279940/
